column5: For our yearly fishing trip, we're going to Ritchies End of Trail for a week, never been there before, we like to hit new spots every year if anyone has any comments or info. it would add to my excitement, thanks

Yes, I've been there. although you should consider portaging to indian lake, we camped on mosquito island with my dads friends big army tent AMAZING walleye occasionly past 5-6lbs I fished with red sided daces tipped on a plain jig, also, some gators, caught a 9lber, your in for a treat!
I wish I was going back up there. Awesome fishing. Non stop action. We used gulp and caught tons. No monsters for us though.
thanks guys, hopefully we will get over to Indian Lk too, should be a good trip, I'll post how we do
